description: Spearheading the development of ADP Assist, a sophisticated AI agent using LangGraph.js and advanced API integrations, delivering intelligent solutions for a large client base with comprehensive Jest test coverage.
Leading UI innovation in Test Automation Framework, designing scalable components with Angular and TypeScript that streamline testing workflows across the organization.
Collaborating in an Agile environment to enhance automated testing processes, significantly improving test coverage and reducing manual effort.
Developed OGMS, a comprehensive software platform to streamline academic processes for Masters and PhD students in the Department of Computer Science.
Built and optimized PostgreSQL database schemas, ensuring efficient storage and retrieval of student applications, course assignments, and funding details.
Implemented role-based access control to protect sensitive student and faculty data.
Developed dynamic UI components for the Test UI Automation project using Angular and TypeScript, improving user experience and functionality.
Collaborated in Agile sprints, participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives to ensure seamless team integration.
Developed OGMS, a comprehensive software platform to streamline academic processes for Masters and PhD students in the Department of Computer Science.
Designed high-performance RESTful APIs using Flask (Python) and optimized PostgreSQL database structures to address complex academic workflows.
Enhanced user experience by integrating React-based frontend, enabling seamless tracking of admissions, GTA assignments, and academic progress
Ensuring the smooth execution of scheduled events by preparing and organizing event spaces.
Assisting event organizers with last-minute setup adjustments and troubleshooting logistical challenges.
Collaborating with team members to ensure timely and efficient event preparations.
Delivered 3+ projects utilizing Angular, TypeScript, and PHP, focusing on robust design, testing, and deployment.
Implemented automated data reconciliation using Spark and Scala, scheduling jobs to run bi-daily for seamless processing.
Optimized SQL queries and resolved customer-reported issues by debugging and delivering reliable code fixes.
Completed 2+ main stream projects where I have developed applications using Angular, Typescript and PHP
Worked in an agile, collaborative environment across software architecture understanding both front-end and back-end concerns.
